# SourceScribe Tests Documentation

This Python file, `__init__.py`, serves as the entry point for the test suite of the SourceScribe project. It contains the necessary setup and configuration to run the project's tests.

This file does not define any classes or functions. It is a simple initialization file that sets up the testing environment.

## Dependencies and Imports
This file does not contain any explicit imports or dependencies. It is a minimal initialization file.
